Name: Epic Naval Battle Simulator
About the game: In Epic Naval Battle Simulator, you are able to create the fleet of your dreams! Currently, there are a few selection of Sci-fi ships to do battle with! But when the game is complete, you will be able to use any ship class from Age of sail, all the way up to modern day! The Yamato class fighting the Bismarck class, the Monitor fighting a Sloop! Anything naval battle you can think of, in Epic Naval Battle Simulator! You are able to place down ships, as each adds to an overall point system! Place down red and blue ships and fight! You can even place down red ships in any fleet formation, and save it for a challenge for lots of different fleet combos!
